subject: Economic Conditions and Trends
Athletics and Sports
Recession and Depression
Wages and Salaries
Baseball
Football
lead_paragraph: With much of the nation reeling, with banks failing, workers being laid off and homes foreclosing, how do sports owners continue to pay players by the millions?
snippet: With much of the nation reeling, with banks failing, workers being laid off and homes foreclosing, how do sports owners continue to pay players by the millions?
